content: grandma s german shells blanket please note- this pattern is written in english american english in american crochet terms this pattern does not have a chart this gorgeous lacy blanket is designed using the german shells or virus stitch and a block or granny stitch groups of double crochets it is lovely in many different colors and grows a lot like a granny square this blanket s finished size is 47 inches by 47 inches square there is a gauge pattern included with this pattern but size numbers may differ for each individual materials needed 1700 yards of red heart super saver or any worsted weight yarn used g 4 25 mm hook scissors level of difficulty intermediate* *if you know how to single_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch chain and read basic crochet patterns you can do this please make sure to read all of the pattern including special notes *************** pattern is available for instant download ************ ***************************************************************************** to view the download button in your purchases after payment you must be on a desk top you may sell the finished blankets/afghans you make pattern is copyright protected it should not be reproduced redistributed or displayed publicly in any way please give credits to jonna martinez and include a link in reference to my shop ****you may not sell or share this pattern **** please refer friends and family to this listing***** also check out my youtube channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucocwjk4rjiqafsf1lsuerna my instagram https //www instagram com/jonnasienamartinez/ this pattern has been tested by a team of crochet testers many thanks to my testers hard work thank you so much for choosing my pattern and shop i hope you enjoy making your new grandma s german shells blanket
